location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire, to Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], Currently at Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, informs Samuel Manesty of the recent respective movements of the Alertand the Recovery. He reports that he has received from Shiraze [Shiraz] the answers to his recent communications. He states that the late unfortunate event [the death of the Persian Ambassador] has not in the least encroached upon the friendship that exists between the two countries [Britain and Persia]. Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun concludes by stating that he will dispatch the Ternatefor the Presidency today, with Cherauk Ally Khaun's letter for the President of Bombay.
